items.content_html: Enigma is a lightweight nodeJS application to store environment variable securely and transfer though API. Very useful to update, pass to ECS and easy to manage. You can also run it to aws:lambda for production preferred and heroku for testing/sandbox env.

items.content_html: SimpleStatCounter is a lightweight JavaScript class designed to create seamless numeric counting animations for elements as they come into view. This class harnesses the power of the Intersection Observer API, making it efficient and performant.
items.title: thatintrovertdeveloper/simple-stat-counter: SimpleStatCounter is a lightweight JavaScript class designed to create seamless numeric counting animations for elements as they come into view. This class harnesses the power of the Intersection Observer API, making it efficient and performant.
